channel.title: Adding a automatic player file save
channel.description: Hi, my server resets every 45 minuets and some players files back up from when they first longed in(if they haven't logged out in the time being) How can I make it so there can be a ::backup command (to save the players characters) and every 44 mins or so there chars save. This would be a great help from some one for this, thanks.
